text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Let me get this right: you're NOT responsible for the UE rate cratering from 4% to 18%; NOT responsible for 110K Americans dying from COVID-19 in 3 mos.; NOT responsible for the riots in our streets, but you ARE responsible for this? How does that work? #TrumpIsAnIdiot
